com.elseforif.utility

类 Web1

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elseforif.utility.Web1

  • public final class Web1
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a number of static facilitators useful for Web programming, such as applets and servlets.

    • 方法详细资料

      • URLEncode

        public static java.lang.String URLEncode(java.lang.String url)
        This used to wrap the URL encoding method in URLEncoder, an interface which seems to get more and more complicated with each version of Java. I've given up on URLEncoder, in fact, and written my own damn encoder. Fuck you, Sun, for making me do this menial thingc because you couldn't fathom character encodings, and so I've got to deal with browser that can't fathom character encodings.

        Also due to browser wimpiness, I can't call 'Character.toString(char)', and such handy methods. This whole class must be browser-safe.
        参数:
        url - a URL to be encoded
        返回:
        the URL-encoded equivalent

      • GetURL

        public static java.net.URL GetURL(java.lang.String url)
        Create and return a URL object for the given string form. If the given string is a malformed URL, this returns null. This is bad. Something should be done.
        参数:
        url - a string representing a URL
        返回:
        an actual URL object, or null if it can't be created

      • GetDocumentBasedURL

        public static java.net.URL GetDocumentBasedURL(java.lang.String url,
                                               java.applet.Applet baseApplet)
        Create a URL based on the base URL of 'baseApplet', whose path is 'url'. Return null if I 'url' is improperly formed.
        参数:
        url - a URL string, sans the server and protocol stuff
        baseApplet - an Applet whose base url is to be used to form the new URL
        返回:
        a new URL based on the given values

      • ShowDocument

        public static void ShowDocument(java.applet.Applet applet,
                                java.lang.String url,
                                java.lang.String target)
        Summon a Web document from the given Applet, either in its own window or another, depending on 'target'.
        参数:
        applet - an Applet from which to spawn the new URL
        url - a string representing the URL to be called
        target - the name of the target window, or null if the applet's window should be used

      • GetImage

        public static java.awt.Image GetImage(java.lang.String url)
        已过时。 because it's so damn easy
        This is just here to remind myself of how to do this!

      • WebifyFilePath

        public static java.lang.String WebifyFilePath(java.lang.String url)
        Convert the given file path into one suitable for a URL. Damn, this music I'm listening to is annoying. Usually this coffee shop plays cool 80's tunes--my stuff. But now I'm hearing some weird acid jazz trancy shit with little variation and a heavy, frenetic high-hat line that just bugs the hell out of me.
        参数:
        url - a file path to be made into a URL
        返回:
        the Webified form of the path

      • HTMLEscape

        public static java.lang.String HTMLEscape(java.lang.String htmlString)
        Replace any characters in 'htmlString' which are special characters in HTML with their respective HTML escape codes, returning the result. This is useful for inserting strings of unknown content into a Web page so that it will not violate the well-formedness or coherency of the surrounding HTML.
        参数:
        htmlString - any string
        返回:
        a new string with any special HTML characters escaped

      • ToHTML

        public static java.lang.String ToHTML(java.lang.String text)
        已过时。 
        Replace any characters in 'htmlString' which are special characters in HTML with their respective HTML escape codes, returning the result. This is useful for inserting strings of unknown content into a Web page so that it will not violate the well-formedness or coherency of the surrounding HTML.
        参数:
        string - any string
        返回:
        a new string with any special HTML characters escaped

      • AlertStringEscape

        public static java.lang.String AlertStringEscape(java.lang.String string)
        Convert 'string' to a form suitable for use as a JavaScript string, for an 'alert()' dialog statement.
        参数:
        string - a message to be displayed in a JavaScript alert dialog
        返回:
        a JavaScript-escaped form of the string

      • GetShortBrowserName

        public static java.lang.String GetShortBrowserName(java.lang.String browserSpec)
        Return a brief string representing the Web browser described in 'browserSpec'. 'browserSpec' should be a browser specification value for the HTTP header "USER-AGENT" that is sent by a browser in an HTTP request. The return value is something like "Nav. 4.08" for Navigator 4.08. If the browser specification cannot be interpreted, this returns "(unknown)".
        参数:
        browserSpec - a string describing a Web browser version
        返回:
        a brief string identifier for the specified browser

      • GetBrowserIDForBrowserSpec

        public static int GetBrowserIDForBrowserSpec(java.lang.String browserSpec)
        Returns the id of the browser of the computer who generated the inputed brower spec.
        参数:
        browserSpec - a string describing a Web browser version
        返回:
        the ID of the browser

      • GetOSIDForBrowserSpec

        public static int GetOSIDForBrowserSpec(java.lang.String browserSpec)
        Returns the id of the operating system of the computer who generated the inputed brower spec.
        参数:
        browserSpec - a string describing a Web browser version
        返回:
        the ID of the OS

      • AddTrailingSlashAsNeeded

        public static java.lang.String AddTrailingSlashAsNeeded(java.lang.String path)
        Append a trailing forward slash to 'path' if it hasn't one already, and return the result.
        参数:
        path - a URL which may or may not have an ending "/"
        返回:
        the path with an ending forward slash

      • AppendParameterToURL

        public static java.lang.String AppendParameterToURL(java.lang.String url,
                                                    java.lang.String name,
                                                    java.lang.String value)
        Return append a name/value pair to a given URL, 'url', using "?" if there are no other parameters in the query string or "&" if there are other parameters. URL encode 'value' before appending it.
        参数:
        url - the URL string to which the parameter is to be appended
        name - the name of the parameter
        value - the parameter's value (not yet URL encoded)
        返回:
        the URL with the specified name/value appended

      • GetSessionCookie

        public static java.lang.String GetSessionCookie(java.net.URLConnection connection)
        Return the servlet session cookie from the URLConnection object.

        Note: this may be specific to just Resin, because of the cookie name.
        参数:
        connection - a URLConnection from which to divine the session cookie
        返回:
        the sesson cookie

      • SetSessionCookie

        public static void SetSessionCookie(java.net.URLConnection connection,
                                    java.lang.String value)
        Set a session cookie on the given URLConnection, as gathered using 'GetSessionCookie()'.

        Note: this too may be specific to just Resin. Note also that this wipes out all other cookies.
        参数:
        connection - the URLConnection on which to set the cookie
        value - the cookie value
